name: Retriever
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

traits.Faultless Tracker: The retriever is given a quarry by its master. The quarry can be a specific creature or object the master is personally acquainted with, or it can be a general type of creature or object the master has seen before. The retriever knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The retriever can have only one such quarry at a time. The retriever also always knows the location of its master.

actions.Multiattack: The retriever makes two foreleg attacks and uses its force or paralyzing beam once, if available.
actions.Foreleg: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d10 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.Force Beam: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16+1d10 + 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.Paralyzing Beam (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18+1d10 + 13 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
